question: An Ancient altar honouring the Greek god Pan has been discovered in which country?
explanation:
Researchers have discovered an ancient altar in Israel. It has been created to honouring the Greek god Pan who is the deity of flocks and shepherds.
The altar was lying on ground while excavating a Church. The altar dated back to 2nd â€“ 3rd century AD, but has been placed in a Church that was built in the 5th century.
